Components¶

We used MVP pattern to create this project.

  • Model
  • View
  • Presenter
  • Libraries

Model¶

GSON Class

View¶

  • NavigationDrawer
  • DrawerLayout
  • XML Layout

Presenter¶

It contains our logic.

Libraries¶

  • Google-Gson & Retrofit-Converter-Gson: Used to parse GSON
  • Retrofit: Used to communicate with our API
  • Picasso: Get image from URL (like profile url)
